data.title: Making Public
data.meta_description: BAK programming combines the artistic, experiential, theoretical, and political so as to imagine and enact transformative ways, with and through art, of being together otherwise. BAK organizes exhibitions, lectures, publications, w
data.text:
Activities of BAK, basis voor actuele kunst, Utrecht are made possible by structural financial support from the Dutch Ministry of Education, Culture, and Science and the City Council of Utrecht.
